scripts.dev:setup: bun run build:windows-x64 && NODE_ENV=development bun --watch run ./setup/index.js
scripts.build: bun run clear:dist && bun run build:windows-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64-musl && bun run build:linux-arm64 && bun run build:linux-arm64-musl && bun run build:setup
scripts.build:windows-x64: NODE_ENV=production bun build ./src/index.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify --outfile dist/bununban-windows-x64 --windows-icon="./src/frontend/assets/favicon.ico" --windows-hide-console --windows-title=bununban --windows-publisher=Greezor --windows-version=0.2.2 --windows-description=BunUnBan && bun win-fix/modify-binary.js ./dist/bununban-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:setup: NODE_ENV=production bun build --compile ./setup/index.js ./node_modules/@webui-dev/bun-webui/src/ffi_worker.ts ./node_modules/@webui-dev/bun-webui/src/webui-windows-msvc-x64/webui-2.dll --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify --outfile dist/bununban-windows-setup --windows-icon="./src/frontend/assets/favicon.ico" --windows-hide-console --windows-title=bununban-setup --windows-publisher=Greezor --windows-version=0.2.2 --windows-description=BunUnBan && bun win-fix/modify-binary.js ./dist/bununban-windows-setup.exe && powershell.exe -Command "Start-Process -FilePath 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\bin\10.0.26100.0\x64\mt.exe' -ArgumentList '-manifest ./setup/win.manifest -outputresource:./dist/bununban-windows-setup.exe;#1' -Verb RunAs"
scripts.dockerize:arm64: bun run build:linux-arm64 && docker run --name bununban --restart always --net=host --cap-add=NET_ADMIN -d -v ./dist:/bununban -w /bununban arm64v8/ubuntu:latest ./bununban-linux-arm64 --homedir=/bununban
